Method Detail

createBogoPic

public Bitmap createBogoPic(int width,
                            int height)
Returns a created Bitmap of width x height. This is a wrapper function for the BogoPicGen and it's static method to create an image

Parameters:
width - the to-be-created image width size
height - the to-be-created image height size
Returns:
Bitmap
See Also:
Bitmap

saveBMP

public boolean saveBMP(java.io.File filepath,
                       Bitmap ourBMP)
Save the given Bitmap to the given File filepath. Returns true if successful and false if unsuccessful.

Parameters:
filepath - filepath to the picture
ourBMP - bitmap of the picture
Returns:
boolean

getPicturePath

public java.io.File getPicturePath()
                            throws java.lang.Exception
Returns a File with a filepath that is created from the current time.

Returns:
File File path to the image
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Exception upon error in creating file/directories for the picture
